text.name: info1
text.text: Dynavision era o nome dado aos consoles fabricados pela Dynacom, que era basicamente clones de consoles conhecidos no mercado Brasileiro tais como o Dynavision 2/3/4 e outras variantes.

text.name: info1
text.text: Dynavision was the name given to the consoles manufactured by Dynacom, which was basically clones of consoles known in the Brazilian market such as Dynavision 2/3/4 and other variants.

text.name: info1
text.text: Dynavision era el nombre dado a las consolas fabricadas por Dynacom, que era b?sicamente clones de consolas conocidas en el mercado Brasile?o tales como el Dynavision 2/3/4 y otras variantes.

text.name: info1
text.text: Dynavision ?tait le nom donn? aux consoles fabriqu?es par Dynacom, qui ?taient essentiellement des clones de consoles connues sur le march? br?silien telles que Dynavision 2/3/4 et d'autres variantes.
